languages.text: {n}Девушка робко улыбается в ответ.{/n} "Боюсь, что это будет не так-то просто, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} — это все равно что пытаться представить могучее светило тлеющим угольком. Но я постараюсь не гневать вас излишней робостью".

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка робко улыбается в ответ.{/n} "Боюсь, что это будет не так-то просто, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} — это все равно что пытаться представить могучее светило тлеющим угольком. Но я постараюсь не гневать вас излишней робостью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

{n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

languages.text: {n}メイヴは気まずそうに笑った。{/n}「恐れながら、それは言うほど簡単ではありません、天の{mf|君|姫君}。それはまるで、燃え盛る太陽を小さな火種だと思い込もうとするようなものです。でも、あまり緊張してご機嫌を損ねないよう、全力を尽くします」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは気まずそうに笑った。{/n}「恐れながら、それは言うほど簡単ではありません、天の{mf|君|姫君}。それはまるで、燃え盛る太陽を小さな火種だと思い込もうとするようなものです。でも、あまり緊張してご機嫌を損ねないよう、全力を尽くします」

languages.text: {n}Maive grinst verlegen.{/n} "Ich fürchte, das ist leichter gesagt als getan, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Das wäre, als würde man versuchen, sich eine mächtige Sonne als winziges Stück glimmende Kohle vorstellen. Ich bemühe mich aber, Euch nicht durch übermäßige Nervosität zu erzürnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive grinst verlegen.{/n} "Ich fürchte, das ist leichter gesagt als getan, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Das wäre, als würde man versuchen, sich eine mächtige Sonne als winziges Stück glimmende Kohle vorstellen. Ich bemühe mich aber, Euch nicht durch übermäßige Nervosität zu erzürnen."

languages.text: {n}Maive vous adresse un sourire décontenancé.{/n} « J'ai bien peur que ce soit plus facile à dire qu'à faire, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Ce serait comme imaginer qu'un grand soleil est une toute petite braise. Mais je tâcherai de ne pas me montrer trop nerveuse pour éviter de vous mettre en colère. »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive vous adresse un sourire décontenancé.{/n} « J'ai bien peur que ce soit plus facile à dire qu'à faire, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Ce serait comme imaginer qu'un grand soleil est une toute petite braise. Mais je tâcherai de ne pas me montrer trop nerveuse pour éviter de vous mettre en colère. »

languages.text: {n}Maive sonríe azorada.{/n} «Me temo que eso es más fácil decirlo que hacerlo, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial; sería como tratar de imaginar que un sol colosal es una brasa diminuta. Pero haré lo posible por no irritarle con mi nerviosismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive sonríe azorada.{/n} «Me temo que eso es más fácil decirlo que hacerlo, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial; sería como tratar de imaginar que un sol colosal es una brasa diminuta. Pero haré lo posible por no irritarle con mi nerviosismo».

languages.text: {n}梅芙露出了恭顺的微笑。{/n}“这说起来容易做起来难，来自上界的大人，这就像是把炽热的恒星想象成微弱的余烬一样。不过，我会尽量表现得不要太紧张，以免惹您生气。”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙露出了恭顺的微笑。{/n}“这说起来容易做起来难，来自上界的大人，这就像是把炽热的恒星想象成微弱的余烬一样。不过，我会尽量表现得不要太紧张，以免惹您生气。”

languages.text: {n}Maive, mahcup bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Korkarım bunu söylemek, yapmaktan daha kolay Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Kudretli bir güneşi, küçük bir kor olarak görmekle eş değer bir durum. Yine de gerginliğimle canınızı sıkmamak için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive smiles sheepishly.{/n} "I'm afraid that is easier said than done, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — it would be like trying to imagine a mighty sun as a tiny ember. But I will do my best not to anger you by acting too nervous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, mahcup bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Korkarım bunu söylemek, yapmaktan daha kolay Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Kudretli bir güneşi, küçük bir kor olarak görmekle eş değer bir durum. Yine de gerginliğimle canınızı sıkmamak için elimden geleni yapacağım."
